name: secp256k1-zkp
description: Essential methods of the secp256k1-zkp lib exported to JS for handling Elements confidential transactions

scripts.configure: npm run docker emconfigure ./configure src secp256k1-zkp --enable-module-rangeproof=yes --enable-module-surjectionproof=yes --enable-experimental=yes --enable-module-generator=yes --enable-module-ecdh=yes
scripts.make-web: npm run docker emmake make install-web

author: Vulpem Ventures
